CustomField.formula: IF( ISNULL( CPR_SH_Compliance_Call_Completed__c ) ,0,1)+IF( ISNULL( Retention_Call_Completed__c ) ,0,1)+IF( ISNULL( ROE_Completed_Date__c ) ,0,1)+IF( ISNULL( Forfeiture_Trade_Date__c ) ,0,1)+IF( ISNULL( Forfeiture_Allocation_Completed_Attached__c ) ,0,1)
CustomField.label: Termination Status Calc
